lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee's decision to reject calls to ban all Russian competitors from the Rio Olympics could lead to "lesser protection for clean athletes," the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: WADA 'Disappointed' by IOC Decision on Russia
headline.main: WADA 'Disappointed' by IOC Decision on Russia

snippet: The International Olympic Committee's decision to reject calls to ban all Russian competitors from the Rio Olympics could lead to "lesser protection for clean athletes," the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) said on Sunday....
